fields.name: Active Skill: Nimbus
fields.value:
• Zues’s <Nimbus> skill will creates multiple lightening strikes in a targeted area, dealing damage and stunning the enemy.
Stun duration: 5 seconds
• Range: 13

fields.name: Passive Skill:
fields.value:
• Zues will increase the attack speed of allied units and reduce the enemy’s attack.
• Every 5 seconds, Zeus will also summon a lightening strike to a random area, dealing damage and stunning the enemy.
Stun duration: ?? seconds
• Range: ??

fields.name: Legendary Skill:
fields.value:
• The lightening strikes of awakened Zeus will deal enemy units additonal damage that is proportional to their maximum health.
• Health Proportion: 6% / 7% / 8% / 9% / 10%
